alert.note: Alert for Tohono O'odham Nation including Sells (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 25 at 4:46PM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Pima County through 530 PM MST... At 446 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles northeast of Pisinemo, or 21 miles northwest of Sells, moving northwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Pisinemo, Covered Wells, Santa Cruz and Mountain Village. This includes Route 86 between mile markers 78 and 101. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
